comment.author: 9406236@N02
comment._content: These picture of inside the Library of Congress Thomas Jefferson Building are wonderful.  Thank you for letting me and the world see.

comment.author: 82609930@N06
comment._content: This is Carol M. Highsmith.  I had the opportunity to work in this glorious building for a period of two years.  It was exciting to actually see this interior up close and to use the latest camera equipment (a brand new 39 megapixel Phase One camera) to document the art.
